title: Crown Preschool Students Learning About the Weather (Coronado Unified School District)
text: ( Source : Coronado Unified School District ) Crown Preschool Students Learning About the Weather This week has been all about weather! We talked about sunny days, windy days, cloudy days, rainy days and even snowy days. We were able to sort
